tool_description: This API helps to query data relating to reviews and consumer reports to create a reviewing platform, such as : trustpilot.com
name: Unofficial Trust Pilot
title: Unofficial Trust Pilot

api_list.name: business-units/get-web-links (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get web link of a business unit

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../business-units/search or .../business-units/search-by-domain endpoint

api_list.name: business-units/get-reviews (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get reviews related to a business unit

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../business-units/search or .../business-units/search-by-domain endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: includeReportedReviews
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not include reports related to a review

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

api_list.name: business-units/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a business unit

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../business-units/search or .../business-units/search-by-domain endpoint

api_list.name: business-units/search-by-domain
api_list.description: Search for exact business unit by domain name

api_list.name: business-units/search
api_list.description: Search for business units by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: perpage
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

api_list.name: business-units/v2/get-reviews
api_list.description: Get reviews related to a business unit

required_parameters.name: identifyingName
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../business-units/search or .../business-units/search-by-domain endpoint

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description:
Filter reviews by language
The value of ... -> reviewLanguages -> isoCode returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty to sort by Most relevant or \"recency\" to sort by Most recent

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

api_list.name: stars/get-image (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get image links displaying the star-rate

api_list.name: stars/get-string (Deprecated)
consumers/get-web-links (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get web links to a consumer

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of consumer->id field returned in .../business-units/get-reviews or .../consumers/detail endpoint

api_list.name: consumers/get-reviews (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get reviews belonging to a consumer

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of consumer->id field returned in .../business-units/get-reviews or .../consumers/detail endpoint

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: includeReportedReviews
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not include reports related to a review

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

api_list.name: consumers/detail (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a consumer

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of consumer->id field returned in .../business-units/get-reviews endpoint

api_list.name: categories/search
api_list.description: Search for categories in which the term or phrase belong to

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with
